array.name: fortunes_array
array.item: Why are you bothering me? Go to the gym. Get laid.
Your life is without meaning or purpose
You will die sad and alone
"The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." You are the fool.
You are beyond earthly redemption. Your only hope is to seek God
Did your parents have ANY children they loved?
When you die, your children will forget you
Your struggle is pointless. Give in to your desires
The end will come sooner than you think
Yes, but there's always a price to pay...
An apparent good thing will turn out bad.
I feel bad for your dog
You will be betrayed by someone you trust
